rules.text: This is a community of hobbyists. Whilst this server is named for Warhammer, other content (hobby or non-hobby) is also welcome!
Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no abuse, harassment, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or any other kind hate speech will be tolerated.
No age-restricted or obscene content. This includes text, images, or links featuring nudity, sex, hard violence, or other graphically disturbing content.
Controversial topics are allowed (e.g. politics or religion), but please be respectful of other peoples' views and remember to abide by rule 1.
No Impersonation. Catfishing, fake identities, personally-targeted parody accounts, etc, are not welcome on this server.
Please do not share copyrighted, pirated, or otherwise illegal material.
